pullrequest.title: Fix bug when simbody is launched without any model

content.raw:
@thomio , could you sync this branch with default? Maybe if you click on the Commits tab on this page, you'll have the option to sync. Otherwise, you can:

~~~
hg pull #!/osrf/gazebo -b default
hg up fix_simbody_blank_world
hg merge default
hg commit -m "merged from default"
hg push
~~~
content.html:
@thomio , could you sync this branch with default? Maybe if you click on the Commits tab on this page, you'll have the option to sync. Otherwise, you can:

hg pull #!/osrf/gazebo -b default
hg up fix_simbody_blank_world
hg merge default
hg commit -m "merged from default"
hg push
